entities.description: The month in which the respondent first smoked part or all of a cigar with marijuana in it.
The time elapsed since the respondent last smoked part or all of a cigar with marijuana in it.
Inconsistency between BLNTREC (Time Since Last Smoked Cigar with MJ in It) and incidence data.
The number of days the respondent smoked part or all of a cigar with marijuana in it in the past 30 days.

relationships.description: Indicates the month when the respondent first smoked part or all of a cigar with marijuana in it.
Indicates the duration since the respondent last smoked part or all of a cigar with marijuana in it.
Notes the inconsistency between BLNTREC and incidence data.
Records the number of days the respondent used a cigar with marijuana in it over the past 30 days.

triplets.subject: Respondent
triplets.object: cigar with marijuana within the last 30 days
